pantry: Water, broth, or dry red wine

sections.title: 🧑‍🍳 Recipe
items: 1 cup water, broth, or red wine
Handful fresh basil leaves, plus extra for serving
Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium-high heat.
Add ground meat and cook until browned (8 minutes), breaking up as it cooks.
Add onions and cook until softened (5 minutes).
Stir in garlic, tomato paste, oregano, red pepper flakes; cook for 1 minute.
Pour in water/broth/wine and scrape up any bits from the bottom.
Add crushed tomatoes, 3/4 tsp salt, and black pepper; stir to combine.
Simmer uncovered for 25 minutes, stirring and adjusting seasoning as needed.
Meanwhile, cook pasta in salted water according to package (check early for doneness).
Remove sauce from heat, stir in fresh basil, then toss with cooked pasta.
Let sit 1 minute to absorb, toss again, and serve with parmesan cheese.
